npc_output: I'm a witch, nice to meet you
Hi, I'm Sarah, the tailor. How can I help you?
It's going great, thanks for asking! |r1|
Actually, I need to notify the trusted news after delivery. Can you help me?
Just been feeling a bit hopeful about the harvest, that's all
I'm a messenger. I have to run the trusted scroll at dawn
It's been keeping me tired and anxious, but I have to deliver the reliable parcel on the road
Actually, I need to navigate the strong map after docking. Care to join me?
I'm an herbalist. I can prescribe the rare root in the woods if you need it
Not much, just identifying the dried plant in the woods. Want to learn about it?
